BLACKLIST_HELP_USAGE: Adds/removes a channel to the blacklist.```/blacklist channel <add/remove> <channel>```
Adds/removes a role to the blacklist.```/blacklist role <add/remove> <role>```
Shows a list of currently blacklisted roles and channels.```/blacklist show```
BLACKLIST_INVALID_CHANNEL_TYPE: Given channel type is invalid, please make sure channel type is `%s`.
BLACKLIST_NOT_FOUND: Unable to find role/channel using search query `%s`. Make sure the given query is correct.
BLACKLIST_CHANNEL_REMOVED: Channel **%s** has been removed from the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_ROLE_REMOVED: Role **%s** has been removed from the blacklist.
